name: biobb_ml LogisticRegression
title: Wrapper of the scikit-learn LogisticRegression method.
description: Trains and tests a given dataset and saves the model and scaler. Visit the LogisticRegression documentation page in the sklearn official website for further information.

output_model_path.description: Path to the output model file

file_formats.description: Path to the output model file

output_test_table_path.description: Path to the test table file

file_formats.description: Path to the test table file

output_plot_path.description: Path to the statistics plot. If target is binary it shows confusion matrix, distributions of the predicted probabilities of both classes and ROC curve. If target is non-binary it shows confusion matrix

file_formats.description: Path to the statistics plot. If target is binary it shows confusion matrix, distributions of the predicted probabilities of both classes and ROC curve. If target is non-binary it shows confusion matrix

independent_vars.description: Independent variables or columns from your dataset you want to train.

target.description: Dependent variable or column from your dataset you want to predict.

property_formats.name: newton-cg
property_formats.description: Recall the motivation for gradient descent step at x: we minimize the quadratic function

property_formats.name: lbfgs
property_formats.description: It's analogue of the Newton's Method but here the Hessian matrix is approximated using updates specified by gradient evaluations

property_formats.name: liblinear
property_formats.description: It's a linear classification that supports logistic regression and linear support vector machines

property_formats.name: sag
property_formats.description: SAG method optimizes the sum of a finite number of smooth convex functions

property_formats.name: saga
property_formats.description: It's a variant of SAG that also supports the non-smooth penalty=l1 option

c_parameter.description: Inverse of regularization strength; must be a positive float. Smaller values specify stronger regularization.

normalize_cm.description: Whether or not to normalize the confusion matrix.

test_size.description: Represents the proportion of the dataset to include in the test split. It should be between 0.0 and 1.0.

restart.description: Do not execute if output files exist.
